00034 namespace glm{
00035 namespace detail

00037         template <bool isFloat>
00038         struct compute_log2
00039         {
00040                 template <typename T>
00041                 T operator() (T const & Value) const;
00042         };
00043 
00044         template <>
00045         struct compute_log2<true>
00046         {
00047                 template <typename T>
00048                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T operator() (T const & Value) const
00049                 {
00050                         return static_cast<T>(::std::log(Value)) * static_cast<T>(1.4426950408889634073599246810019);
00051                 }
00052         };
00053 
00054         template <template <class, precision> class vecType, typename T, precision P>
00055         struct compute_inversesqrt
00056         {
00057                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static vecType<T, P> call(vecType<T, P> const & x)
00058                 {
00059                         return static_cast<T>(1) / sqrt(x);
00060                 }
00061         };
00062                 
00063         template <template <class, precision> class vecType>
00064         struct compute_inversesqrt<vecType, float, lowp>
00065         {
00066                 GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static vecType<float, lowp> call(vecType<float, lowp> const & x)
00067                 {
00068                         vecType<float, lowp> tmp(x);
00069                         vecType<float, lowp> xhalf(tmp * 0.5f);
00070                         vecType<uint, lowp>* p = reinterpret_cast<vecType<uint, lowp>*>(const_cast<vecType<float, lowp>*>(&x));
00071                         vecType<uint, lowp> i = vecType<uint, lowp>(0x5f375a86) - (*p >> vecType<uint, lowp>(1));
00072                         vecType<float, lowp>* ptmp = reinterpret_cast<vecType<float, lowp>*>(&i);
00073                         tmp = *ptmp;
00074                         tmp = tmp * (1.5f - xhalf * tmp * tmp);
00075                         return tmp;
00076                 }
00077         };
00078 }//namespace detail

00080         // pow
00081         template <typename genType>
00082         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType pow
00083         (
00084                 genType const & x, 
00085                 genType const & y
00086         )
00087         {
00088                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(
00089                         std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559,
00090                         "'pow' only accept floating-point inputs");
00091 
00092                 return std::pow(x, y);
00093         }
00094 
00095         VECTORIZE_VEC_VEC(pow)
00096

00101                 genType const & x
00102         )
00103         {
00104                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(
00105                         std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559,
00106                         "'exp' only accept floating-point inputs");

00129         //exp2, ln2 = 0.69314718055994530941723212145818f
00130         template <typename genType>
00131         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType exp2(genType const & x)
00132         {
00133                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(
00134                         std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559,
00135                         "'exp2' only accept floating-point inputs");
00136 
00137                 return std::exp(static_cast<genType>(0.69314718055994530941723212145818) * x);
00138         }
00139 
00140         VECTORIZE_VEC(exp2)
00141 
00142         // log2, ln2 = 0.69314718055994530941723212145818f
00143         template <typename genType>
00144         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER genType log2(genType x)
00145         {
00146                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559 || std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_integer,
00147                         "GLM core 'log2' only accept floating-point inputs. Include <glm/gtx/integer.hpp> for additional integer support.");
00148 
00149                 assert(x > genType(0)); // log2 is only defined on the range (0, inf]
00150                 return detail::compute_log2<std::numeric_limits<genType>::is_iec559>()(x);
00151         }
00152 
00153         VECTORIZE_VEC(log2)

00155         namespace detail
00156         {
00157                 template <template <class, precision> class vecType, typename T, precision P>
00158                 struct compute_sqrt{};
00159                 
00160                 template <typename T, precision P>
00161                 struct compute_sqrt<detail::tvec1, T, P>
00162                 {
00163                         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec1<T, P> call(detail::tvec1<T, P> const & x)
00164                         {
00165                                 return detail::tvec1<T, P>(std::sqrt(x.x));
00166                         }
00167                 };
00168                 
00169                 template <typename T, precision P>
00170                 struct compute_sqrt<detail::tvec2, T, P>
00171                 {
00172                         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec2<T, P> call(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & x)
00173                         {
00174                                 return detail::tvec2<T, P>(std::sqrt(x.x), std::sqrt(x.y));
00175                         }
00176                 };
00177                 
00178                 template <typename T, precision P>
00179                 struct compute_sqrt<detail::tvec3, T, P>
00180                 {
00181                         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec3<T, P> call(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & x)
00182                         {
00183                                 return detail::tvec3<T, P>(std::sqrt(x.x), std::sqrt(x.y), std::sqrt(x.z));
00184                         }
00185                 };
00186                 
00187                 template <typename T, precision P>
00188                 struct compute_sqrt<detail::tvec4, T, P>
00189                 {
00190                         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER static detail::tvec4<T, P> call(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & x)
00191                         {
00192                                 return detail::tvec4<T, P>(std::sqrt(x.x), std::sqrt(x.y), std::sqrt(x.z), std::sqrt(x.w));
00193                         }
00194                 };
00195         }//namespace detail

00197         // sqrt
00198         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float sqrt(float x)
00199         {
00200 #               ifdef __CUDACC__ // Wordaround for a CUDA compiler bug up to CUDA6
00201                         detail::tvec1<float, highp> tmp(detail::compute_sqrt<detail::tvec1, float, highp>::call(x));
00202                         return tmp.x;
00203 #               else
00204                         return detail::compute_sqrt<detail::tvec1, float, highp>::call(x).x;
00205 #               endif
00206         }
00207 
00208         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER double sqrt(double x)
00209         {
00210 #               ifdef __CUDACC__ // Wordaround for a CUDA compiler bug up to CUDA6
00211                         detail::tvec1<double, highp> tmp(detail::compute_sqrt<detail::tvec1, double, highp>::call(x));
00212                         return tmp.x;
00213 #               else
00214                         return detail::compute_sqrt<detail::tvec1, double, highp>::call(x).x;
00215 #               endif
00216         }
00217                 
00218         template <typename T, precision P, template <typename, precision> class vecType>
00219         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<T, P> sqrt(vecType<T, P> const & x)
00220         {
00221                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'sqrt' only accept floating-point inputs");
00222                 return detail::compute_sqrt<vecType, T, P>::call(x);
00223         }

00225         // inversesqrt
00226         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER float inversesqrt(float const & x)
00227         {
00228                 return 1.0f / sqrt(x);
00229         }
00230         
00231         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER double inversesqrt(double const & x)
00232         {
00233                 return 1.0 / sqrt(x);
00234         }
00235         
00236         template <template <class, precision> class vecType, typename T, precision P>
00237         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER vecType<T, P> inversesqrt
00238         (
00239                 vecType<T, P> const & x
00240         )
00241         {
00242                 GLM_STATIC_ASSERT(std::numeric_limits<T>::is_iec559, "'inversesqrt' only accept floating-point inputs");
00243                 return detail::compute_inversesqrt<vecType, T, P>::call(x);
00244         }
00245 
00246         VECTORIZE_VEC(inversesqrt)
